ai-tha-ap370:0.3_0: He laid down on one side, the senior monks in Campā,
ai-tha-ap370:1.4_0: I didn’t go to the supreme person.
ai-tha-ap370:2.3_0: Both with both hands and feet,
ai-tha-ap370:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap370:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap370:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Campā.
ai-tha-ap370:6.1_0: Eight senior monks from Campā was a hundred senior monks.
